name: King’s Valley
overview: Just as in the original classic, this game will once again put you in the shoes of an adventurer on a quest to collect gems while also avoiding angry mummies and other such deadly monsters! The game features not only different sound effects, but there's plenty of fun to be had through many of the of the 16 full themed levels in M.A Software's King's Valley on the Amiga. For further details and development please see the main website below.
